alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Lower Clark Fork Region; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 7:26PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Idaho, southwestern Missoula and northwestern Ravalli Counties through 815 PM MDT/715 PM PDT/... At 725 PM MDT/625 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles west of Victor, or 21 miles northwest of Hamilton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lolo, Stevensville, Victor, Florence, Pinesdale and Bell Crossing. This includes Highway 93 S between mile markers 52 and 78. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH

area.areaDesc: Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Lower Clark Fork Region; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys
